original: Julin, Sven, apO’tekare, Skara, f. 20/ 9/80 i Sthlm av Carl Fredrik J. o. Ellen Estelle. G. 1. 10 m. Elsa Maria Fernström, d. 18; 2. 24 m. Sigrid Ingeborg Augusta Åkerblom. Barn: Greta f. 11, Sten Iwan Gunnar 14, Karl Iw^an 16, Lars Erik Alfred 24, E’llen Ingela 27, Kerstin Rigmor Johanna 28. — Mog:ex. i Sthim 99, farm. kand. 02, apotiex. 09. Elev v. apot. i Hudiksvall 99-01, anst. där, v. Örnen i Sthlm 02-06, i Nora 06-07 o. 09-10, varav som förest, sju mån., v. Bävern i Västerås 10-22, varav som förest. c:a två år, i Järvsö 22-30 (förest.), priv. å apot. i Skoig 30, transp. t. apot. i Skara 38. Pens. 47. Rev. i Västerb.-Ångermani. krets av Sv. apot:förb. 33i-38.
translated: Julin, Sven, apothecary, Skara, born September 20th, 1880 in Stockholm to Carl Fredrik J. and Ellen Estelle. Married 1st, for 10 months, to Elsa Maria Fernström, who died in 1918; 2nd, for 24 months, to Sigrid Ingeborg Augusta Åkerblom. Children: Greta born in 1911, Sten Iwan Gunnar in 1914, Karl Iwan in 1916, Lars Erik Alfred in 1924, E’llen Ingela in 1927, Kerstin Rigmor Johanna in 1928. Graduated from Stockholm College of Pharmacy in 1899, received a pharmaceutical degree in 1902, and became a licensed apothecary in 1909. Was an apprentice at a pharmacy in Hudiksvall from 1899-1901, worked there and at Örnen pharmacy in Stockholm from 1902-1906, worked in Nora from 1906-1907 and 1909-1910, where he served as superintendent for seven months, worked at Bävern pharmacy in Västerås from 1910-1922, where he served as superintendent for approximately two years, worked and served as superintendent in Järvsö from 1922-1930, was private pharmacist in Skoig in 1930, and was transferred to Skara pharmacy in 1938. Retired in 1947. Was a member of the Swedish Pharmacy Association and served as a district auditor from 1933-1938 for the Västerbotten-Ångermanland region.

issuedBy.name: Swedish National Board of Health and Welfare

affiliation.name: Västerbotten-Ångermanland region of the Swedish Pharmacy Association
